info.name: 9Anime Orange & White
info.description:
A Orange & White theme for 9Anime that gives a new look. Some features are disabled and/or not recommended such as Minimal Mode & the Request Tab. Custom video player is only for the server F4, at this moment in time.

Took some inspiration from "Cleaner 9Anime by bodpod" & Crunchyroll.
info.additionalInfo:
2017-10-31 // Added ads because 9anime needs money to maintain there servers.
2017-10-04 // Fixed image bug & color fixes.
2017-09-29 // Bug fixes.
2017-09-29 // Published Theme.
